p: Congratulations! You should now be able to design a new robot that is completely free of bugs. It should be capable of:

ul.li: seeing if there is a wall both to its left and to its right without having to do turns (that would leave traces if performed);
being able to turn right directly
being able to turn on or off the oil leak upon creation;
being able to determine which direction (East, North, West or South) it is facing.

p: Do so and make sure to test it thoroughly. Then use this new robot to solve some of the challenges, in particular the two where the robot has to get out of a maze.
